4.「なんてこと……！| 星の大樹の飾りが ぜんぶ…………: Oh, my God. All the ornaments on the big|star tree...

The Silver Star Night Festival is about to|begin! Let's join our voices together to|welcome the messenger of the Holy Heaven in|
|grand style!

. I've been watching from the heavens, and|I'm so sorry those demons stole all your|ornaments! You overcame all difficulties and|
|decorated it well!

15.「さっすが テンチョ……じゃなかった| 聖天の使いさま 待ってましたー！: That's great, Tencho... I mean, the|messenger of the Holy Heaven. I've been|waiting for you!

16.「はっはっは。お前ら そう せっつくな。| ちゃんと全員分あるから 順番に並べ: Ha. You're right. You're right. There's|enough for all of us. In order.

17.「ダンディでしょう？ あれが 聖天の使いさま。| ……ですが 私たちも| あの方: Dandy, right? That's the messenger of the|Holy Heaven. ... But we don't know much|about him.

18.「何か 自分の使命を果たすために| 光りかがやく 天の箱舟に乗って| 遠い遠い世: Something to fulfill my mission| Riding on the shining Ark of Heaven| I hear they travel to a world far, far away

19.「妖精の女王さまの 古い知り合いらしくて| いつからか 私たちのために この星夜: She's an old acquaintance of the Fairy|Queen, and she's been holding this Starry|Night Festival for us for some time now.

20.「よお お前さんが トナカイにふんして | 飾りを 取り戻してくれたんだな。|: Hey, you're the one that dressed up as a|reindeer and brought back the ornaments.|You're a cooler looking fella than you look!

21.「ホラよ。こいつは いいトナカイぶりを見せた| お前さんへの プレゼントだ。|: . He was a good reindeer. I got it without|the Enrio.

24.「えっ！ テンチョ……じゃなかった| 聖天の使いさま 今年は| 一緒に お祝いし: What? ! Tencho... I mean, the messenger of|the Holy Heaven, will you celebrate with us|this year?
